markers_desc: ViDo Guesthouse is situated in Merrivale on the outskirts of the historical town of Howick in the KwaZulu Natal Midlands. It is set in a mature, park-like garden with a country atmosphere.  Visitors wake up to the sounds of a farm and birdsong.
